CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 6, 1952, page 13, reads: "Among Speakers - Among those at one end of the speakers table were Mayor Kopriver, Congressman James G. Fulton, Ralph Ord, Jury Commissioner; Mrs. Robert L. Vann Courier Publisher; F.C. McKee, industrialist; John J. Kane, County Treasurer; District Attorney James F. Malone Jr., and Rosy Rosewell, Pirates Radio Announcer."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait including, left to right: Duquesne Mayor Frank Kopriver Jr., Congressman James G. Fulton, Jury Commissioner Ralph Ord, Courier Publisher Jessie Vann, industrialist F.C. McKee, County Treasurer John J. Kane, District Attorney James F. Malone Jr., and Pirates Radio Announcer Rosy Rosewell, seated at banquet table for county Republican victory celebration at Syria Mosque
